SELECT count(*) FROM produce_board
WHERE produce_type=#{produce_type}

SELECT count(distinct produce_board.produce_num)
FROM produce_board, pay_history WHERE produce_board.produce_num = pay_history.produce_num AND pay = 1
FROM produce_board, pay_history, produce_review WHERE pay=1 AND produce_review.pay_num = pay_history.pay_num AND produce_board.produce_num = pay_history.produce_num
SELECT * FROM produce_board WHERE produce_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

SELECT rcp_li.* FROM (SELECT rcp.*, rownum rm FROM (SELECT * FROM produce_board WHERE produce_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY produce_num DESC)rcp)rcp_li WHERE rm >= #{startRow} AND rm <= #{endRow}

SELECT rcp_li.* FROM (SELECT rcp.*, rownum rm FROM (SELECT produce_board.produce_num, produce_board.user_id, produce_board.produce_type, produce_board.produce_name, produce_board.price, produce_board.produce_image, produce_board.produce_image_path, produce_board.produce_description FROM produce_board, pay_history WHERE pay = 1 AND produce_board.produce_num = pay_history.produce_num GROUP BY produce_board.produce_num, produce_board.user_id, produce_board.produce_type, produce_board.produce_name, produce_board.price, produce_board.produce_image, produce_board.produce_image_path, produce_board.produce_description ORDER BY sum(quantity) DESC )rcp)rcp_li
WHERE rm between 1 AND 4
